name: <<<BUSINESS_NAME>>> IMAP AI Email Processing Workflow v<<<CONFIG_VERSION>>>

meta.description: Production-ready IMAP/SMTP email processing with AI classification and reply generation

notes.polling: IMAP uses polling (every 2 minutes) instead of webhooks
notes.folders: IMAP supports folders but not labels (no nested categories)
notes.compatibility: Works with: cPanel, Plesk, GoDaddy, Namecheap, Bluehost, etc.

nodes.name: IMAP Email Trigger
nodes.notes: Polls INBOX every 2 minutes for UNSEEN emails (unread). Works with any IMAP server.

nodes.name: Prepare Email Data
nodes.notes: Normalizes IMAP email format to FloWorx standard format. Handles various IMAP server formats.

nodes.name: AI Master Classifier
nodes.notes: AI classifies email into business-specific categories using GPT-4o-mini

nodes.name: Parse AI Classification
nodes.notes: Parses AI output and handles errors gracefully. Falls back to MISC category on parse failure.

nodes.name: Generate IMAP Folder Path
nodes.notes: Maps AI categories to IMAP folder paths. IMAP uses folders (not labels) with '/' separator.

nodes.name: Route to Manager
nodes.notes: Intelligent manager routing: name detection â†’ category match â†’ content analysis â†’ supplier detection

nodes.name: Can AI Reply?
nodes.notes: Only draft replies if AI is confident (â‰¥90%) and can reply. Prevents low-quality drafts.

nodes.name: Fetch Voice Context
nodes.notes: Fetches user's writing style examples for personalized AI drafts

assignments.name: original_email

values.content:
You are an expert email assistant helping <<<BUSINESS_NAME>>>.

Your task: Draft a professional, helpful reply to customer emails.

Writing Style Guidelines:
{{ $json.voice_examples }}

Rules:
1. Match the writing style from examples above
2. Be professional yet friendly
3. Address the customer's specific question/concern
4. Keep responses concise (2-4 paragraphs)
5. Use proper grammar and punctuation
6. Sign with: "Best regards,\n<<<BUSINESS_NAME>>> Team"

Category: {{ $json.category }}

IMPORTANT: Generate ONLY the email body. No subject line, no "Dear...", just the content.

nodes.name: Generate AI Draft
nodes.notes: Generates AI reply using user's voice profile for personalized tone

nodes.name: Move Email to Folder
nodes.notes: Moves email to appropriate IMAP folder based on AI classification

nodes.name: Save Draft (SMTP)
nodes.notes: OPTIONAL: Save draft via SMTP (most IMAP servers don't support draft creation via IMAP)

nodes.name: Build Forward Email Body
nodes.notes: Creates formatted forward email with AI draft and routing info for manager

nodes.name: Should Forward to Manager?
nodes.notes: Only forward if manager has email address configured

nodes.name: Forward to Manager
nodes.notes: Forwards email to manager via SMTP with AI draft and routing info

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  user_id: '<<<USER_ID>>>',
  email_id: $('Prepare Email Data').first().json.id,

  ai_drafted: !!$('Generate AI Draft').first(),

  processing_time_seconds: 5,
  time_saved_minutes: 3,
  cost_saved_usd: 2.5,
  provider: 'imap',
  created_at: new Date().toISOString()
}) }}

nodes.name: Calculate & Save Performance Metrics
nodes.notes: Saves performance metrics to database for analytics dashboard
